typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpStream
source(output(
		DepID as string,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DepartStream
EmpStream, DepartStream join(department == DepID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
